meanings.definition: A person who performs or enjoys funk music.
meanings.sent1: The funksters played their instruments with passion.
meanings.sent2: We danced all night to the funky beats of the funksters.
meanings.sent3: The funksters had the whole crowd grooving to their music.
meanings.sent4: The funksters were like a musical rainbow, spreading joy with every note.
meanings.sent5: The funksters' music was so infectious, it made everyone move involuntarily.

meanings.definition: A group of people who create or listen to funk music.
meanings.sent1: The funksters gathered in the park for a jam session.
meanings.sent2: We joined the funksters at the concert and had a blast.
meanings.sent3: The funksters brought funky vibes wherever they went.
meanings.sent4: The funksters' unity was as tight as their rhythm section.
meanings.sent5: The funksters' passion for funk music was palpable in every note they played.
